lead_paragraph: There was an exciting race of Railroad engines, given at Lowell, to-day, in connection with the Mechanics' Fair, in that City. The following engines entered the contest: the Addison Gilmore, of Western Railroad, doing the distance, 9 miles on the Boston and Lowell track, in 12 min. and 18 sec.: the Nathan Hale, of the Worcester Line, 12 min. 56 sec.;
